General.Name: Taiwan Line Tek Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Line Tek Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic wiring sets, signal cables, and power cord sets in Asia, Europe, Africa, and America. The company engages in the manufacture of various computer system power transmission line sets; and processing and trading of power transmission line sets, information peripheral product signal connection lines, and connection line sets of communication systems. It also provides power supply cord sets; PVC plastic pellets; charging cables for smart electric vehicles; and connection wire sets for communication systems. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 272, Beishen Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
